name: EVReflectionCore
summary: Fork from evermeer/EVReflection, just for iOS platform.
description: [Reflection](https://github.com/TommyFen/EVReflection) based object mapping (Dictionary, CKRecord, NSManagedObject, Realm, JSON and XML) including extensions for [Alamofire](https://github.com/Alamofire/Alamofire) and [Moya](https://github.com/Moya/Moya) for network abstraction. And on top of that extension for [RxSwift](https://github.com/ReactiveX/RxSwift/) and [ReactiveSwift]
